caption: Went in to get change, but figured they would either say yes or no, she just closes register and I ask for change for a $20, she says I dont know if I can do that looks back at guy in kitchen turns around without saying anything to him, so I buy a desert not looking at the date get home which is 3 mins away she sells me a slice of red velvet cake that's 8 days old for $3.81 never going back again what happened to Plazzios

prices have gone up a bit. still a decent cheap slice. tv on with sound up, in addition to music playing. a pet peeve of mine. also sometimes with insane swearing and lude music playing. not so great for my 6 year old.
They need better phone order takers. They seem to always screw up my simple order. Worst part is, I have done business with them for years. Smh
Good slices and sandwiches from Italian beef to chicken parmesan.
